name: There's Not Enough ___: The Game Show!
name_original: There's Not Enough ___: The Game Show!
description:
A 3D game show where the player is given a sentence that is missing word(s) and must choose which of four possible answers correctly fills the gap. Over the course of the game, the player learns that there is more at stake to the game than initially thought…

Credits:

Design: Kobi Andt, Cameron Mayman

Art: Elijah Potter
